duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain software-defined networking deployments with VMware NSX-T.
Implement and support network technologies and protocols including BGP, VRF, MPLS, IP, TCP, UDP in a data center context.
Develop, maintain, and support networks in NSX/NSX-T.
Develop, test, and deploy software solutions in Python and JavaScript.
Utilize REST APIs for software development and integration.
Collaborate with teams to ensure Agile development processes and practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
